TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FormsIdentity extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity

Docs.summary: Represents a user identity authenticated using forms authentication. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> when a user is authenticated with forms authentication. An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is created using the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> that is decrypted from the forms-authentication cookie or from the URL. The new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class is used to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that is set as the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
## Examples The following code example generates a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> and then uses it to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity> class, based on whether the user supplies the correct user name and password on the form.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.FormsIdentity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.FormsIdentity/CS/FormsIdentity.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.FormsIdentity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.FormsIdentity/VB/FormsIdentity.aspx#1)] -->

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: The identity upon which this identity is based.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified identity.
Gets the type of authenticated identity.
Docs.value: The type of authenticated identity. This property always returns "Forms".

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of claims that are associated with this identity.

Docs.summary: Gets a copy of the current instance.
Docs.returns: A copy of the current instance.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether authentication took place.
Gets the user name of the forms identity.
Docs.value: The user name of the forms identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.Name%2A> property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> supplied to the constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets the for the forms-authentication user identity.
Docs.value: The supplied to the constructor for the current object.
